Method Detail

send

protected boolean send(java.lang.String message,
                       java.lang.String ipAddressPort,
                       java.lang.String destination,
                       boolean toBeQueued,
                       int hopCount)
                throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                       java.io.IOException
Sends a HTTP message.

Parameters:
message - contents of message to send
ipAddressPort - IP address:port to which to send the message
destination - ultimate destination of the message (encode in URL)
toBeQueued - is the message to be queued for store-and-forward? (encode in URL)
hopCount - is the count of hops to detect routing loops (encode in URL)
Returns:
true if message was sent and HTTP response received, otherwise false
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException
java.io.IOException

              throws java.io.IOException
Parameters:
port -
Throws:

protected void stop()
             throws java.io.IOException
Stops listening for HTTP messages.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
